org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi

Interface BugtrackingConnector


  • public interface BugtrackingConnector
    Represents a bugtracking connector.

    Bugtracking system registration can be done via BugtrackingConnector.Registration. 

       @BugtrackingConnector.Registration (
      id = "foo.bar.MyConnector",
      displayName ="My Connector",
      tooltip = "This is My Connector")    
   public class MyConnector extends BugtrackingConnector {
  
    ... 
 
   }
    Since:
    1.85

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  BugtrackingConnector.Registration
      Register a BugtrackingConnector in the IDE.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Repository createRepository()
      Called to create a new, not yet initialized, repository instance.
      Repository createRepository(RepositoryInfo info)
      Called to create a repository instance based on already existing data - either created in a previous session, or provided by other means - e.g from a maven pom file.

    • Method Detail

      • createRepository

        Repository createRepository()
        Called to create a new, not yet initialized, repository instance. Typically, this method is called from the create repository action. The returned repository is then subsequently presented in the repository dialog, so that the user can provide the necessary repository connection data. On user confirm the infrastructure takes care of persisting the data and uses them to create a repository instance in the next session. See also createRepository(org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.RepositoryInfo).

        The to be returned Repository instance can be obtained via
        BugtrackingSupport.createRepository(java.lang.Object, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueStatusProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueScheduleProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssuePriorityProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueFinder)
        in which scope the implementation particular repository representation is coupled with provider implementations giving access to the plugin internal data.

        See also RepositoryController on how the interaction with the repository UI is handled.

        Returns:
        the created repository
        Since:
        1.85
        See Also:
        BugtrackingSupport, BugtrackingSupport.createRepository(java.lang.Object, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueStatusProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueScheduleProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssuePriorityProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueFinder)

      • createRepository

        Repository createRepository(RepositoryInfo info)
        Called to create a repository instance based on already existing data - either created in a previous session, or provided by other means - e.g from a maven pom file.

        The to be returned Repository instance can be obtained via
        BugtrackingSupport.createRepository(java.lang.Object, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueStatusProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueScheduleProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssuePriorityProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueFinder)
        in which scope the implementation particular repository representation is coupled with provider implementations giving access to the plugin internal data.

        See also RepositoryController on how the interaction with the repository UI is handled.

        Parameters:
        info - repository information based on which the repository should be created
        Returns:
        a Repository instance.
        Since:
        1.85
        See Also:
        BugtrackingSupport, BugtrackingSupport.createRepository(java.lang.Object, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueStatusProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueScheduleProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssuePriorityProvider, org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueFinder)
